name: Magic Water - 9th Tilted Game Jam Game
name_original: Magic Water - 9th Tilted Game Jam Game
description:
MY FIRST GAME JAM GAME!

For my first game jam the theme was "Gelatinous Poseidon" and what do I do? Make a Ghosts'n Goblins inspired retro platformer where you collect bubbles to fight a giant serpent... makes sense to me.

Controls

  • Left and Right Arrows - Move left and right
  • Up Arrow - Jump
  • Down Arrow - Throw Trident

Story

Poseidon's Magic Water has been stolen by the Serpent Thief and trapped in "gelatinous" bubbles. They are guarded by slimes and flying watchers. You must make your way through the level, defeating the enemies and collecting the Magic Water. Collecting the water will increase Poseidon's power to open the door at the end of the level as well as replenish a heart if you are missing any. Good luck Champion, you'll need it.
